description.value: You can speak with animals and plants. Any living creature you summon is considered part of your bond and doesn't count against the maximum number of creatures in your bond. During your daily preparations, choose one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{summon animal}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lpT6LotUaQPfinjj]{summon elemental}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hs7h8f4Z1ZNdUt3s]{summon fey}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{summon plant or fungus}. You add the selected spell to your spell repertoire and signature spells until your next daily preparations.
